Reviews.Title: It's a awesome second phone
Reviews.Author: Jatin Thakkar
Reviews.Content: It's an awesome product and for the size it's fits in a punchIt's not cheap like many other similar products in the same category.My only wish list would be a similar phone with a basic camera

ProductInfo.Features:
Credit card size, ultra slim, easy put in wallet
Easy to carry, this mini mobile phone is perfect for use as a secondary mobile phone: It a MUST have contingency mobile phone besides your smartphone
Bright OLED, better vision than LCD
Bluetooth, FM radio,touch shock,MP3 function,Alarm clock,Calendar
GSM 850/900/1800/1900 MHz Unlocked
ProductInfo.Name: Mini Ultra Slim Credit Bank Card Size Cell Mobile Phone GSM Quadband MP3 Bluetooth
